specific_question: How many customer service inquiries do we receive from centennial shoppers on average per quarter?
answer: 2,500 customer service inquiries from centennial shoppers are received on average per quarter.
justification: Knowing the volume of inquiries will help assess the feasibility of implementing chatbots to enhance the consumer experience.
dr_question: How can Lee's Market leverage chatbots to enhance the consumer experience for centennial shoppers?
